name: Skylands (itch)
description:
It's Unity - give 'er a sec to load.

Left click to walk/drop seeds. Right click to break tiles. Be careful some seeds can only be used once! 8 levels total.

Guide Johnny Tileseed through the skies by growing and destroying tiles. Expand your small world to traverse the sky!

Team:
Art & Levels: Mark Usmiani - https://mark-usmiani.tumblr.com/ https://twitter.com/MarkUsmianiArt
Animation: Connor Wilson - twitter.com/tungstengroove
Music & SFX: Haberworks
Programming & Levels: Boz - http://aesthgames.tumblr.com https://twitter.com/huminaboz
